name: Angelite Crystal Ring
des: Promotes peace, calmness, and gentle emotional healing. Helps enhance spiritual awareness and inner balance.

name: Bloodstone Crystal Ring
des: Known for boosting strength, courage, and vitality. Supports physical energy and grounding protection.

name: Goldstoneblue Crystal Ring
des: A stone of ambition and positive motivation. Encourages confidence, focus, and success energy.

name: Rainbow Crystal Ring
des: Balances emotions and uplifts overall energy. Brings harmony, positivity, and joyful vibrations.

name: Rose Crystal Ring
des: The crystal of love and emotional healing. Encourages compassion, self-love, and heart harmony.

name: Sodalite Crystal Ring
des: Enhances clarity, logic, and emotional balance. Supports communication and inner calm.

name: Tiger Crystal Ring
des: A powerful stone for courage and self-confidence. Attracts protection, strength, and success energy.

name: Vessonite Crystal Ring
des: Encourages emotional strength and stability. Supports grounding while enhancing positive flow.
